thread.title: CSG Government Solutions Sponsors the American Association of Motor Vehicle Administrators Annual International Conference
thread.title_full: CSG Government Solutions Sponsors the American Association of Motor Vehicle Administrators Annual International Conference - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: CSG Government Solutions Sponsors the American Association of Motor Vehicle Administrators Annual International Conference
text:
CSG Government Solutions, a national leader in government program modernization, recently sponsored the American Association of Motor Vehicle Administrators (AAMVA) Annual International Conference held August 25-27 in Des Moines, Iowa.
Chicago, Illinois
CSG Government Solutions , a national leader in government program modernization, recently sponsored the American Association of Motor Vehicle Administrators (AAMVA) Annual International Conference held August 25-27 in Des Moines, Iowa.
AAMVA is a nonprofit organization developing model programs in motor vehicle administration, law enforcement, and highway safety. The Annual International Conference showcases the latest trends, technological developments, best practices and solutions in the motor vehicle and law enforcement community while providing a forum for chief administrators to learn and grow from fellow jurisdiction executives.
“We appreciate the high educational value AAMVA provides to its members across the nation,” says Patti Garofalo, Director of CSG’s Program Modernization practice. “We are proud to be an Associate member of AAMVA and appreciate the opportunity to sponsor and exhibit at this year’s Annual International Conference.”
CSG Government Solutions continues to increase its presence across the United States. The company deploys highly experienced teams and innovative methods, knowledge, and tools to help governments modernize complex program enterprises. CSG clients include 42 state governments, the U.S. Department of Health and Human Services, the U.S. Department of Labor, and large municipal governments.
CONTACT:

ABOUT CSG GOVERNMENT SOLUTIONS:
CSG Government Solutions is a leading government operations consulting firm focused on helping states modernize critical program enterprises. Our highly experienced teams and industry-leading Centers of Excellence help governments leverage innovative technology and processes to meet the challenges of administering complex programs. Founded in 1997, CSG has established itself as a trusted adviser to government agencies across the U.S.
